percy.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Heebo:wght@300;400;500;700&display=swap'); .percy-hide { visibility: hidden !important; } .percy-mask { filter: blur(8px) !important; color: transparent !important; background: #cccccc !important; } .percy-stable { animation: none !important; transition: none !important; } body[dir='rtl'] { font-family: 'Heebo', Arial, sans-serif; } [data-percy-sensitive] { filter: blur(10px) !important; background: #f0f0f0 !important; color: transparent !important; }
